definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: You have no feeling for the beauty of nature.
sentences.chinese: 大自然的美缺乏欣赏力。

sentences.english: Nature must be gladsome when I was so happy.
sentences.chinese: 当我欣喜万分的时候，大自然也一定非常高兴。

sentences.english: What is the positive attitude towards the nature?
sentences.chinese: 对大自然应抱什么态度？

sentences.english: This wonder can only be credited to the nature.
sentences.chinese: 这种巧夺天工只能归功于大自然。

sentences.english: Pic. o2 Jacqueline Urbina: An ener with nature during a walk on Exuma Island, Bahamas.
sentences.chinese: 在巴哈马埃克苏马岛与大自然亲密接触。

sentences.english: In the process of artists exploring the technique to deeply expressing the natures outlook and spirit, texturing method was born.
sentences.chinese: 皴法的产生是画家深入表现大自然的形质的探索结果。

sentences.english: We may just be following Mother Nature's ancient recipe.
sentences.chinese: 我们可能正走在大自然曾走过的老路，步其后尘。

sentences.english: If such be Nature's holy plan.
sentences.chinese: 设若这就是大自然的神圣的旨意。

sentences.english: We were completely amazed at the wonder and the greatness of nature.
sentences.chinese: 这一奇观和大自然的伟大使我们完全惊愕了。

sentences.english: Therefore, it should conform to the nature and be esthetical.
sentences.chinese: 它应该是符合大自然的，也必须是美的。

sentences.english: What can man do in the face of nature’s wrath?
sentences.chinese: 在盛怒的大自然面前，人类能做什么？

sentences.english: Nature plays a harmonious symphony of sounds together in such regions.
sentences.chinese: 在这些地区大自然都在演奏和谐恢宏的交响曲。

sentences.english: Humanity along with the slave race in particular was utilized to construct the matrixes along with nature.
sentences.chinese: 人类尤其是奴隶族，被用于和大自然一起来构建矩阵。

sentences.english: Why doesn't nature allow even stronger non-locality?
sentences.chinese: 为什么大自然中不存在更强的非定域性。

sentences.english: The nature's great power creates lingshan's spirit stones.
sentences.chinese: 大自然的鬼斧神工造化了灵山奇石。

sentences.english: We enjoyed the beauty of nature.

definition: oneness of heaven and humanity/the theory that man is an integral part of nature
supernaturally fine craft (idiom); the work of the Gods/uncanny workmanship/superlative craftsmanship
lit. green hills and clear waters/pleasant country scene (idiom)
life (as the characteristic of living beings)/living being/creature/CL:個|个[ge4],條|条[tiao2]
